name: Boumaberg
culture_notes: Highland Cant base with Riveric trade loanwords
diet: smoked cheese, barley dumplings; market spices from coastal traders
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized labor
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: State-level authority unclear; burg semi-autonomous with powerful guilds
Tech: near-medieval to early-industrial; combustion industry limited
